statements: SELECT * FROM customer_verification WHERE id = 1;
SELECT full_name, dob FROM customer_verification WHERE id = 3;
SELECT address FROM customer_verification WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_verification WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT id, full_name, address FROM customer_verification ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_verification WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, dob, address FROM customer_verification WHERE dob <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT id, full_name, phone_number FROM customer_verification WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, full_name, dob FROM customer_verification WHERE dob BETWEEN '1975-01-01' AND '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_verification WHERE full_name LIKE 'J%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_verification;
SELECT id, full_name, address FROM customer_verification;
SELECT customer_id, date_of_birth FROM customer_verification ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM verification_documents WHERE document_expiry_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT full_name, address FROM customer_verification WHERE verification_status = true;
SELECT * FROM customer_verification;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, address FROM customer_verification WHERE verification_status = TRUE;
SELECT full_name, address, verification_status FROM customer_verification WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, document_type, document_number, document_expiry_date FROM verification_documents WHERE document_expiry_date IS NULL;
SELECT cv.full_name, vd.document_type, vd.document_number FROM customer_verification cv JOIN verification_documents vd ON cv.customer_id = vd.customer_id WHERE cv.verification_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_information WHERE identification_type='Passport';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM identification_documents WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM verification_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_information WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT c.customer_name, i.document_type FROM customer_information c JOIN identification_documents i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, v.verification_date FROM customer_information c JOIN verification_history v ON c.customer_id = v.customer_id WHERE v.verification_status = 'Verified';

SELECT c.customer_name, i.document_type, v.verification_date FROM customer_information c JOIN identification_documents i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN verification_history v ON c.customer_id = v.customer_id ORDER BY v.verification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_info;
SELECT full_name, address FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, government_id FROM customer_info WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM identity_documents ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, verification_date, status FROM verification_status WHERE status = 'verified';
SELECT * FROM customer_info;
SELECT full_name, address FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT document_id, document_type, issue_date FROM identity_documents ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT verification_id, status FROM verification_status WHERE verification_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT log_id, log_details FROM verification_logs WHERE log_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM customer_information WHERE verification_status = TRUE;
SELECT document_type, expiration_date FROM document_information ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, verification_date, verification_result FROM verification_history WHERE verification_result = 'approved';
SELECT error_message FROM verification_errors WHERE error_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT full_name, address FROM customer_information WHERE verification_status = true;
SELECT document_type, expiration_date FROM document_information ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM customer_information WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT v.verification_result, ve.error_message FROM verification_history v JOIN verification_errors ve ON v.verification_id = ve.verification_id;
